title: First Look: Campagnolo’s More Affordable EKAR GT Groupset is Widest Range Option Yet
content:
Our first look the Italian manufacturer's new 13-speed gravel bike groupset and alloy Zonda GT wheelset.

Read the full article at First Look: Campagnolo’s More Affordable EKAR GT Groupset is Widest Range Option Yet on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
